description.fr: {#critical}\_: Vole {PMvalue:Spell.13388.pm,abs} à la cible pour le tour.
description.en: {#critical}: Steals {PMvalue:Spell.13388.pm,abs} from the target for the turn.
description.es: {#critical}: Roba {PMvalue:Spell.13388.pm,abs} al objetivo durante el turno.
description.de: {#critical}: Entzieht dem Ziel für die Runde {PMvalue:Spell.13388.pm,abs}.
description.pt: {#critical}: Rouba {PMvalue:Spell.13388.pm,abs} do alvo durante o turno.
